INetworkReaderImp Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FdoINetworkCommand is the base of all the FDO network analysis comands.

Note: This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change the software related to the content herein.


Public Member Functions

System::Double GetCost ()
 This method is used to get the total cost of the current path.
NAMESPACE_FDO_COMMANDS_NETWORK::INetworkPathReader * GetPath ()
 This method is used to get the next path reader.
System::Boolean ReadNext ()
 This method is used to advance to the next path of the list of returned paths.
